price: Je! Wenye maradhi nyoyoni mwao wanadhani kwamba Mwenyezi Mungu hatazidhihirisha chuki zao?
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَن لَّن يُخۡرِجَ ٱللَّهُ أَضۡغَٰنَهُمۡ
footnotes: Hivyo wanadhani hawa wenye unaafiki katika nyoyo zao kwamba Mwenyezi Mungu hatazifichua chuki zao wanazo mchukia Mtume wake na Waumini?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: am ḥasiba alladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun an lan yukh'rija al-lahu aḍghānahum
